keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map k scrollDown
map h scrollUp
map J scrollLeft
map L scrollRight

map j previousTab
map l nextTab

map H goBack
map K goForward

map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map gl lastTab
map gj firstTab

map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
